masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "There's a fog spreading from the old cemeteryâ€”everyone who enters it gets trapped in visions of their worst Christmas memories. People are catatonic, crying, reliving old traumas. A figure in the mist is feeding on their regret. This is some Ghost of Christmas Past nightmare!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Enter the fog and confront the entity
  • Free the trapped victims from their memory prisons
  • Don't get lost in your own past
